buttonName.fieldDescription: This 'Open a business account' button will be displayed on the right side of the Header Navigation bar in the Desktop layout

buttonLink.fieldDescription: The 'Open a business account' button should lead to a page with a form to create a new business account

signInLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Sign In' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout

categoryLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Categories' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout
categoryLinksLabel.name: ./header-categoryLinksLabel

homePageLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Home' label will be displayed on the first place on the left side of the of the Header Navigation bar in the Desktop layout
homePageLabel.name: ./header-homePageLabel

companyLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Company' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout
companyLinksLabel.name: ./header-companyLinksLabel

companyLinksList.fieldDescription: Add links like 'About Us', 'Contact Us'. Synchronisation with Blueprint (Master) disabled (inheritance cancelled)

logoTitle.fieldDescription: Set logo image title for SEO

logoLink.fieldDescription: The logo should lead to the main page of DHL Group

invitation-text.emptyText: Join over 5000+ SMEs already growing with Discover?
invitation-text.name: ./footer-invitation-text

promo-text.emptyText: Get tips and advice on delivering exceptional logistics service and expanding your business to global audience.

categoryLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Categories' label will be displayed above the list of all categories
categoryLinksLabel.name: ./footer-categoryLinksLabel

companyLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Company' label will be displayed above the list of all links connected to the company
companyLinksLabel.name: ./footer-companyLinksLabel

companyLinksList.fieldDescription: Add links like 'About us', 'Press', 'Contact'. Synchronisation with Blueprint (Master) disabled (inheritance cancelled)

socialLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Social' label will be displayed above the list of all links connected to the social messengers
socialLinksLabel.name: ./footer-socialLinksLabel

socialLinksList.fieldDescription: Add links like 'LinkedIn', 'Instagram', 'Twitter', 'Facebook'. Synchronisation with Blueprint (Master) disabled (inheritance cancelled)

title.fieldLabel: Title (will be used if the component does not have a custom title configuration)
title.fieldDescription: This field allows you to define a default title for related posts. This default title will be used when the component doesn't have a custom title configured. If you don't set a default title and there's no custom title configuration, no title will be displayed for the related posts.
title.name: ./relatedPosts-title
